snippet.title: Machine Cave NES Trailer - Mega Cat Studios Video Game
snippet.description:
A large asteroid is approaching the earth. It is still far away, but something isn't right. Our scanners can't get clear readings and satellites sent to sample it get blown up. With our teleportation technology, we sent a manned space ship called the terminator to gather information. What we learned was shocking. The asteroid was some kind of autonomous warmachine factory, Machine cave. If it reached the earth, it would be a disaster. We lost contact with terminator but learned the weakness of the machines: their power generator, machine heart. We can teleport a small ship past most of their defences to destroy it. That is your mission. Find and destroy the machine heart and escape the caves through it's exhaust shaft.

Check it out and more at: https://www.megacatstudios.com

Come join in on the discussion at our official Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/megacat

Machine Cave is not licensed, sponsored, published, or endorsed by Nintendo Co. Ltd, or their affiliates.

Mega Cat Studios is an independent games development studio. This title is an unofficial and unlicensed release for the Nintendo console, and is not affiliated with Nintendo Co., Ltd, or their affiliates. 

Nintendo® and Famicom® are trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd.
For more on Mega Cat Studios and our games, please visit: https://megacatstudios.com/

Come play & talk on discord! www.discord.gg/megacat
